packiteasy


WEBSITE

packiteasy is a startup that needed a web presense. They wanted a hip, young feel for their new line of interchangeable travel wear. They have some great looking stuff.

VISIT WEBSITE
THE PROBLEM

They wanted the site to be responsive and work well on small screens. They also wanted to keep the site clean and easy to navigate. At this point they are not selling directly from the site but want to in the future.

THE SOLUTION

I went for a minimal design asthetic that focused on the clothing. They provided excellent images of their product and I added a light box for each item and a hover effect that prompted the user to click on the image. I used their basic color scheme and added color accents. The site was built in html5 and css3 and can easily be converted to a shopping cart.
